hero.subtitle: Authentic Latin Cuisine
hero.title: A Taste of Tradition
hero.description: Experience the vibrant flavors of Latin America in the heart of San Francisco. Our family recipes have been passed down through generations, bringing you the authentic taste of home.

about.subtitle: Our Story
about.title: Family Tradition Since 1995
about.description: El Rincón de Jorgito began as a small family-owned restaurant in the heart of San Francisco. Founded by Jorge Rodriguez, our restaurant has been serving authentic Latin American cuisine for over 25 years.

freshness.title: Fresh Ingredients
freshness.description: We source the freshest local ingredients daily to ensure the highest quality in every dish.

tradition.title: Traditional Recipes
tradition.description: Our family recipes have been passed down through generations, preserving authentic flavors.

community.title: Community Focus
community.description: We're proud to be part of the local community, supporting local farmers and producers.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: The passionate individuals behind our delicious food and warm atmosphere.

chef.name: Jorge Rodriguez
chef.bio: With over 30 years of culinary experience, Jorge brings his passion for traditional Latin cuisine to every dish.

souschef.name: Maria Rodriguez
souschef.bio: Maria learned to cook alongside her father Jorge, and now brings her own creative twist to our traditional recipes.

manager.name: Carlos Mendez
manager.bio: Carlos ensures that every guest enjoys an exceptional dining experience from the moment they walk in.

menu.subtitle: Our Offerings
